column4: i'm having trouble installing ubuntu-desktop after upgrading from hoary
says alot of stuff 'won't be installed' and refuses to install ubuntu-desktop :(
anybody know how to fix this?
i can't use either of those
aptitude is ncurses, works in a virtual terminal
a couple of pointers for interactive:
i think that might be working! thanks!!
apt-cache depends ubuntu-desktop will show you what is needed for ubuntu-desktop; something under that is broken somewhere. Welcome to breezy :)
you can interactively examine that list and try fixing it in aptitude.
